CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
buzzing in tape makes it hard to hear

u.a: M pushes C's chair in; C had stood up to get a dish
C pours with teapot in her cup; M manipulates dishes
C reaches over M to get a cup
M holds toy person from house; puts in chair
M stirs in her cup; C pours in her own cup; picks up a knife to stir in her cup
C puts knife down; picks up spoon; looks at M; smiles
M eats; C eats; they laugh
C picks something up from floor
C pours from teapot in cup; picks up small pitcher
C pours from teapot in M's cup; pours with pitcher
M taps saucer for C to place cup on
C points at something near house
C starts to move her chair; M moves house
M turns pages of book back
C turns page; almost closes book
C tries to turn another page; but it was last one
C closes book and eagerly reaches for another
M points at a picture; points to another
